zh.title: 雪崩币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前，雪崩币（AVAX）在13.0638美元附近波动，显示出震荡整理的趋势。过去24小时内，价格变化微乎其微，表明市场参与者对当前价格水平的看法较为谨慎。鉴于价格未能突破13.0686美元的高点，短期内可能继续维持在13.05至13.07美元之间。

从技术指标来看，MACD值为-0.334，显示出当前市场处于弱势状态，尚未形成明显的反弹信号。虽然RSI指标数据缺失，但结合价格走势可以推测，市场情绪偏向于谨慎，可能需要进一步的利好消息来推动价格上涨。20日简单移动平均线（SMA）在13.53021美元处，可能成为短期阻力。

在支撑和阻力位方面，13.0538美元为近期的强支撑位，如果价格跌破该水平，可能引发更大的抛售压力。相反，若能有效站稳13.07美元以上，则有望向13.53美元挑战。建议短线交易者可考虑在支撑位附近布局，设定止损，以应对潜在的市场波动。

en.title: Avalanche vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Avalanche (AVAX) against the US Dollar stands at 13.0638, reflecting a slight decline of 0.04% over the past 24 hours. This minor fluctuation suggests a period of consolidation as the asset tests the lower boundary of its recent trading range. The high and low of the day, 13.0686 and 13.0538, indicate a tight price action, which may lead to increased volatility if the asset breaks out of this range in either direction. Observing the overall trend, AVAX has been experiencing downward pressure, suggesting a bearish sentiment in the short term.

Analyzing the moving averages, the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) stands at 13.53021, which is significantly above the current price. This gap indicates that the recent price action is below the longer-term average, reinforcing the bearish trend. The MACD value of -0.33400892 suggests downward momentum, although the lack of a signal line prevents further interpretation at this time. Traders should remain cautious and consider the possibility of further declines if the price fails to reclaim the SMA.

Support for AVAX appears to be around the 13.0500 level, as indicated by the recent low of 13.0538. A breakdown below this support could lead to a test of lower levels, potentially around 12.8000, where additional buying interest may emerge. Conversely, resistance is likely to be encountered at the previously mentioned 20-day SMA of 13.53021. A sustained move above this level could signal a shift in momentum, encouraging buyers to re-enter the market.

In terms of trading strategies, short-term traders may consider waiting for a clear break above 13.53021 before entering long positions, while those with a bearish outlook could look for opportunities to short near resistance levels. Implementing stop-loss orders just below the support at 13.0500 can help manage risk effectively. As always, monitoring broader market conditions and sentiment will be crucial for making informed trading decisions.
